name: Haunted House (Guild Adventure)
overview: In this absorbing adventure game, beware of the ghost as you search for treasures and negotiate the hazards of the castle and graveyard. This one is for the kids. The house has ghosts, goblins, vampires and treasures and problems designed for the 8 to 13 year old. This is a read adventure and does require some thinking and problem solving - but only for kids.
